entry.title: [BIP 15] Aliases
entry.summary: In a communication on December 19, 2011 at 2:56:09 AM, Jorge Timón expressed preference for sticking to simple standards and using HTTP alone as the foundation for building. Timón was responding to a suggestion that JSON be used for the "answer format". While JSON was considered an acceptable option, Timón pointed out its limitations in terms of language support and ability to represent binary data. In contrast, the HTTP specification allows for binary data in multipart content.
